QuestData.Title: Whack-a-Gnoll
QuestData.Description:
Oh, Light... there are more on their way! How could this happen?
All my careful planning! The days spent hiding in this rancid lake! The assassinations!
This should have thrown them into chaos and caused their settlement to crumble, but we've barely slowed them down!
Maybe... maybe you're right, $n. I've been wrong all along...
No! Impossible! We're in too deep now anyway.
Go...deal with these new arrivals. I need time to collect myself.
QuestData.RewardText:
They're just going to keep fighting until they find a new leader? That settles it then. If I'm ever going to have a base of operations here, we'll have to kill all of them.
The plan is that we...
Wait, you're leaving? You don't want any part of this? What am I going to do? I can't leave this lake now that I've made an enemy of the gnolls!
Fine! Side with those flea-bitten miscreants!
Take what I promised and go. You're not the only "champion" in these woods! I'll find someone else to help me!
